title: Lol. Why are stupid people so sensitive?
body:
Some of these people probably can't even read, how can they be offended? I'm just saying, they get worse working at McDonald's.

Game 1
ThreeSP33d: least he picked a support champ.
ThreeSP33d: wow 6 cs jg
ThreeSP33d: gg
ThreeSP33d: and tops gone, thanks team
ThreeSP33d: great, now your collective failures are in my lane thanks team !
ThreeSP33d: let the record state I won my lane
ThreeSP33d: scrub team
ThreeSP33d: your gank did nothing
ThreeSP33d: 17 cs and 4 deaths! thank you!
ThreeSP33d: 0-5 DEFINITELY MEANS YOUR BAD :)
ThreeSP33d: oh now you don't care, the problem is you were crap before and there is no difference
ThreeSP33d: correction, a BAD support
ThreeSP33d: well, you and your adc are 0-9 combined so whatever your doing I wouldn't define it as supporting
ThreeSP33d: supporting has a connotation of being helpful
ThreeSP33d: the other teams getting sloppy because they don't regard any of you as a threat
ThreeSP33d: I know, cuz you are special
ThreeSP33d: know that you are trash thresh
ThreeSP33d: you are 3-5 scrub
ThreeSP33d: there you go scrub
ThreeSP33d: trash team
Game 2
ThreeSP33d: dont feed their jg and we are ok
ThreeSP33d: wtf ez play safe moron thats twice
ThreeSP33d: not if the person playing him is a retard
ThreeSP33d: because im not dealing with you giving it to eve or xerath
ThreeSP33d: this ez
ThreeSP33d: gg thanks ez
ThreeSP33d: you are awesome, feed, abandon lane
ThreeSP33d: thats some plat skill right there
ThreeSP33d: thats not gankable
ThreeSP33d: not my fault mid fed their mid and jg then abandoned lane so xerath could just roam
ThreeSP33d: not even defendable, im not a tank and they have cc
ThreeSP33d: we not win, lets just please surrender, it was a waste of time the moment we got this mid
ThreeSP33d: 0-3, please instruct me
ThreeSP33d: also the sona that cant land an ult
ThreeSP33d: also not my fault
ThreeSP33d: there was nothing I could do mid when ez kept pushing to tower and dying
ThreeSP33d: yeah, a team with no tank, no cc, and moron for mid, i had sooo much to work with
ThreeSP33d: so does our adc and supp :)
ThreeSP33d: yeah, not knowing how to positon will do that for you jinx, also a sona that doesn't know when to ult
ThreeSP33d: but yeah, my fault for 3 failed lanes
ThreeSP33d: if only you had good wave clear and could retreat back to tower
ThreeSP33d: an adc with aoe would be op
ThreeSP33d: like she would have 2 kinds of auto
ThreeSP33d: and a global ult.
ThreeSP33d: I would call her jinx
ThreeSP33d: and feed more than you play :)
ThreeSP33d: see there was a good time to ult sona
ThreeSP33d: lol im kda neutral, this loss was my fault
ThreeSP33d: not the 3 feeding lanes
ThreeSP33d: their jg rly didn't have much to do with it either. all of you just straight lost
Game 3
ThreeSP33d: you guys are not making this easy always pushing unless im on the opposite sede of the map
ThreeSP33d: just hold on to your turret bot
ThreeSP33d: swear to god, just focus lanes and objectives stop chasing dumb fights
ThreeSP33d: bot is beyond help
ThreeSP33d: why are you idiots in the jg?
ThreeSP33d: this bot lane
ThreeSP33d: sor for the love of god stop getting caught
ThreeSP33d: becuase our bot is bad
ThreeSP33d: this bot lane
ThreeSP33d: is so bad
ThreeSP33d: like neither of you know how to play your champs
ThreeSP33d: because this game is a waste because of you.
ThreeSP33d: your cs and deaths are like trash
ThreeSP33d: doesn't excuse your pla
ThreeSP33d: play
ThreeSP33d: vayne and raka gonna magically stop being trash?
ThreeSP33d: ffs vayne
ThreeSP33d: this is 3v5
ThreeSP33d: lets fucking wander off nvm
ThreeSP33d: VAYNE WTF
ThreeSP33d: BASE
ThreeSP33d: wtf idiots
ThreeSP33d: BASE
ThreeSP33d: omg fucking retards
ThreeSP33d: retard team

replies.body: I dont. see how you could think anyone could look at that and feel any sympathy for you

I see lots of infantile raging, crying and generally obnoxious behavior.

Nobody needs to listen to a brat run their mouth. 
Solution: remove brat.
Brat was removed. 
End of story.

TBF even candy land has a clause of not being a dick inside it
But hey if thats your speed have at it
candy land is a great game

> [{quoted}](name=Magical Player,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-27T03:32:49.149+0000)
>
> TBF even candy land has a clause of not being a dick inside it

Yeah, but if they were off playing candy land I wouldn't need to be a dick to them.

> [{quoted}](name=ThreeSP33d,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-27T03:34:10.969+0000)
>
> Yeah, but if they were off playing candy land I wouldn't need to be a dick to them.

But the question becomes why did you feel the need to be a dick in the 1st place?

> [{quoted}](name=Magical Player,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-02-27T03:45:16.809+0000)
>
> But the question becomes why did you feel the need to be a dick in the 1st place?

Because they are stupid. I think that's one thing I've been consistently clear on.

> [{quoted}](name=ThreeSP33d,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-27T04:20:43.682+0000)
>
> Because they are stupid. I think that's one thing I've been consistently clear on.

But then you raging at them isn't gonna make them any less stupid. If anything it'll make them even more stupid because then they're being distracted by your constant raging and flaming. Think of it this way: the more time you spend raging and flaming at others the less time that you spend actually playing the game itself.
Damn, I didn't know league of legends qualified as an IQ test.

> [{quoted}](name=ThreeSP33d,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-27T04:20:43.682+0000)
>
> Because they are stupid. I think that's one thing I've been consistently clear on.

But go deeper, why did you need to be a dick to "stupid" people? Clearly ignorance is bliss, why would they change because you were a dick to them?

> [{quoted}](name=ThreeSP33d,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-27T03:34:10.969+0000)
>
> Yeah, but if they were off playing candy land I wouldn't need to be a dick to them.

Hey THREESP33D, dont bother talking to thse so called "sensitive" types in a forum. Those guys are idiots and so is RIOT for only giving you the script where you said these things. No one will ever be able to understand what actually happened until you can see what the other side said. I consider this layer base a bunch of "Wusses" who get offended because of some words so that they start reporting people like dicks. 

All I say to these guys is when you are in a social situation like online games, expect to be called out about our shitty plays. I get called out aall the time and I am fine about it and I will try to not do the shitt thing that gets me killed and lose the game.

"wow 6 cs jg"

This is non constructive criticism. How does this help your team? Tell us.

I think the worst part about this is you talking down about people who work at McDonalds (or whatever fast food place).  While the work might not be difficult compared to some other jobs, you really do work your ass off in fast food, or any other service job. Typically there's never a dull moment, always something that needs prepped, or cleaned, or customers that need taken care of. Why don't you try working that job and see what you think then? Though if your attitude here is any indication of how you are in real life, I doubt you'd last long being completely unable to work together with people you don't know in a team environment.

Idk, why are you so sensitive, to the point that you gush out as if your life depends on it or something and then proceed to come to the board to have yet another crying session because nobody wants to play with you?

"Did you know: Teammates perform worse if you harass them after a mistake."

I dunno man, in general, the biggest idiot spends time in game screaming at idiots that they are idiots.

* if they are idiots it achieves nothing and you get banned(because idiots hope to punish you).

* if they are not idiots, they are not going to care and you get banned(for you being an idiot).

Dunno if they were the ones sensitive tbh
damn bro youre toxic as fuck

To be frank with you, you getting flamed and then doing it back REALLY doesn't help. The more you keep doing that, the worse it'll get, and the more you get reported. So back off or keep doing it and get banned. Your choice.

And if I'm being toxic, go ahead and think that, but this is honestly what I think considering your chat logs.

not everyone you play with speaks english. not everyone you play with comes from north america - some hop servers (which personally i think is asking for trouble)

other than that this game is welcoming (or at least was supposed to be) to young adults and teens. you cant expect a child who is still incapable of doing algebra to understand the concept of calculus. not everyone is playing to be a professional league of legends team member. some are just playing because they like the game.

the more you bash those players the closer you get to losing your account. if you dont have anything useful or nice to say then stop typing in chat. it might keep you from your inevitable permanent ban.

I hope that's just the negative snippets from your chat and not the entire chat... because you've said absolutely nothing positive at all. If that's your entire chat log, it's not what you said, it's the fact that for three games, that's all you've said.
I'm just saying they should be playing candy land or something more suited to their intellect.

> [{quoted}](name=ThreeSP33d,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tVw9U4d5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-27T03:29:05.514+0000)
>
> I'm just saying they should be playing candy land or something more suited to their intellect.

you know for all the accusations of calling players stupid or retarded, you sure have a way of sounding like a liberal without the facts.

i mean you are assuming that rito needs to unpunish you even though you were the one acting like a child and not taking the high road and putting it behind you.

its people like you that make the league community what it is today and honestly that self righteousness attitude of yours needs to change. maybe you should read more into what being sensitive is, you did get mad threw multiple games that got you suspended.

Ah, idiots of the world unite! It's beautiful. You should all join hands and have a "We are the World Moment". We could even put it on PBS and using it during a pledge drive. Might even save Sesame Street.
